channel.title: 1950s Britain on Hector Rufrancos
channel.description: Recent content in 1950s Britain on Hector Rufrancos

item.title: The Poor and the Poorest, fifty years on: Evidence from British Household Expenditure Surveys of the 1950s and 1960s
item.description: This paper revisits Abel-Smith and Townsend's landmark study of poverty in early post World War 2 Britain using the modern methods. Published in JRSSA , 2017.
